name: Traffic These Days
description:
// If you are experiencing considerable frame drops on the WebGL build, consider downloading the standalone build for a better experience. //

Traffic in this city has always been bad. That's bad, because you've got to get to work!

Weave through the cars, follow the road and get to your workplace by moving your car forward or backward. Better to take it safe than to get into a car crash!

Gameplay & Visuals -   Pokopish

Music - abstrkt

Splinemesh Asset - Meth
